ShowEmployee module¶

class ShowEmployeeWidget(parent=None)¶

Bases: PySide.QtGui.QWidget

PySide widget that shows all the employee informations in a tabular form

QTableWidget is used to show the info in a table. The getAllEmployeeInfo() method from DatabaseManager is used to get all the information as a list which is then arranged in the QTableWidget.

See also

  • getAllEmployeeInfo() method of DatabaseManager
goBack()¶
loadTable()¶

Loads all the info in the QTableWidget

setupUI()¶

Arranges GUI elements inside the widget properly
